overview: Mira thinks that she has to travel with Maudy, her mom. Not Mira hates her mom, it's just that their was as simple as the between and children in general, since Mom and Pop divorced, and a few years later Pop died. But everything change when they must go to Payakumbuh, West Sumatra, to meet the recent demand of Uci (grandmother from Popâ€™s side), who is ill.
title: Me Vs Mami
